text.__SUMMARY__: Tillandsia arequitae is a species in the genus Tillandsia. This species is native to Brazil and Uruguay, its specific epithet referring to Cerro Arequita, Lavalleja Department in Uruguay.
text.Cultivars:
Tillandsia 'Mystic Rainbow'
Tillandsia 'Mystic Rainbow Peach'
Tillandsia 'Mystic Rainbow Pink'
